content: **skill level ** beginner **gauge ** in single_crochet - 18 sts = 4 20 row = 4 with smaller hook check your gauge use any size hook to obtain the gauge given **cardigan directions** are for 0-3 months changes for 6-9 months and 12-18 months are in parentheses **to fit chest ** 17 20 22 **finished chest measurement ** 211/2 241/4 263/4 -buttoned **color combination/yardage ** 6 ounce solid/5 ounce sparkle skeins cardigan 3/4 1 11/4 ounces 5011 white ca 5 6 71/2 ounces 8737 powder pink sparkle cb **alternate color combinations ** 5011 white with 8881 powder blue sparkle 8322 powder yellow sparkle 8011 white sparkle or 8680 new mint sparkle **crochet hooks ** u s sizes f-5 3 75mm and g-6 4mm five 1/2 buttons sewing needle and thread
